HomePage.title: Universal Bookmark Manager
HomePage.description: Save and organize your bookmarks with one click. Access them anywhere, anytime.

save.title: One-Click Save
save.desc: Save any webpage to your collection with a simple drag and drop installation.

categorize.title: Smart Categories
categorize.desc: Automatically categorize your bookmarks for better organization.

access.title: Access Anywhere
access.desc: Sync across devices, access your bookmarks anywhere.

share.title: Share & Collaborate
share.desc: Easily share bookmark collections and collaborate with others.

NotFoundPage.title: 404: This page could not be found.
NotFoundPage.description: This page could not be found.

DocPage.title: Pocker Quick Start
DocPage.description: Cross-device, cross-browser local-first bookmarks management tool

intro.title: What is Pocker?
intro.description: Pocker is a local-first bookmark collection tool that allows you to save and organize web bookmarks with one click and access them from any device.

features.title: Key Features
features.categories: Organize and filter bookmarks by categories

markName.title: Set Your Bookmark Name
markName.description: This name will be used for your bookmark collection and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

bookmarklet.title: Install Bookmark Tool
bookmarklet.description: Drag the button above to your browser's bookmark bar to save the current webpage anytime.

setup.title: Set Up Your Bookmarklet
setup.description: Follow the instructions above to create your bookmark collection name and add the bookmarklet to your browser's bookmark bar. Each bookmark collection name corresponds to a separate bookmark collection.

save.title: Save Webpages to Your Collection
save.description: When browsing a webpage, click the Pocker bookmarklet in your bookmark bar to open the bookmark addition page. Fill in the category and description (optional), then save.

access.title: Access Your Bookmark Collection
access.description: Access {{baseUrl}}/{{mark}} to view and manage all your saved bookmarks. You can access this URL from any device or browser.

manage.title: Organize and Manage Your Bookmarks
manage.description: You can edit or delete bookmarks, change category views, sort by different criteria, and use category filters to quickly find the bookmarks you need.

demo.title: Want to Experience Pocker?
demo.description: Try all the features of Pocker without creating a bookmark collection

BookmarksPage.title: Bookmarks
BookmarksPage.bookmarkletTip: Drag this button to your bookmarks bar to save pages with one click
BookmarksPage.demoDescription: This is a demo collection. You can freely add, edit, and delete bookmarks. All changes will only affect your local view and won't be saved to the server.

MarkInput.label: Bookmark Mark
MarkInput.description: The mark will be used to distinguish different bookmark collections. It's recommended to use meaningful phrases. Current mark:

BookmarkCard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?

BookmarkDialog.addDescription: Add a new bookmark to collection {{mark}}
BookmarkDialog.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete bookmark "{{title}}"?
BookmarkDialog.deleteConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. The bookmark will be permanently removed from your collection.
BookmarkDialog.urlDescription: The URL of the webpage you want to bookmark
BookmarkDialog.title: Title
BookmarkDialog.titleDescription: A descriptive title for your bookmark
BookmarkDialog.descriptionDescription: Add some notes about this bookmark
BookmarkDialog.categoryDescription: Choose a category to organize your bookmarks
BookmarkDialog.redirecting: Redirecting to your bookmarks in 3 seconds...
BookmarkDialog.addSuccessDescription: Your bookmark has been added successfully
BookmarkDialog.updateSuccessDescription: Your bookmark has been updated successfully
BookmarkDialog.deleteSuccessDescription: Your bookmark has been deleted successfully

Notifications.bookmarkExists: Bookmark with this URL already exists
